subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: For application within a particular State or Territory, the volumes of the NCC comprise inclusively ofâ€”

ol.li: Sections A to G, I and J and associated schedules of Volume One; and
Sections A and H and associated schedules of Volume Two; and
Sections A to E and associated schedules of Volume Three.

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: State and Territory variations, additions and deletions must be complied with in conjunction with the NCC.

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: The NCC is subject to, and may be overridden by, State or Territory legislation.

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: State and Territory variations, additions and deletions are contained in the following Schedules:

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: State and Territory variations and deletions are identified throughout the NCC.
